analysis.description:
BETSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0x38bbe5d0926122900dd50741b051bf323cd401ae.sol#115-132) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(address(this)) == 0 || bet_purchased[msg.sender] == 0

BETSale.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0x38bbe5d0926122900dd50741b051bf323cd401ae.sol#54-68) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(seller,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/24/0x38bbe5d0926122900dd50741b051bf323cd401ae.sol#65-68)

BETSale.seller should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0x38bbe5d0926122900dd50741b051bf323cd401ae.sol#45-47)
DaoCasinoToken.CAP should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0x38bbe5d0926122900dd50741b051bf323cd401ae.sol#15-16)
DaoCasinoToken.totalEthers should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0x38bbe5d0926122900dd50741b051bf323cd401ae.sol#16-17)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/24/0x38bbe5d0926122900dd50741b051bf323cd401ae.sol#55:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
